posts.title: First Blog Post
posts.body: This is the content of the first blog post. It talks about Vue composables.

posts.title: Another Post
posts.body: This is another post with more content, discussing front-end development.

posts.title: Learning Vue Router
posts.body: Vue Router helps in building single page applications with route-based views.

posts.title: State Management with Pinia
posts.body: Pinia is the recommended state management library for Vue 3. It is intuitive and easy to use.

posts.title: Using Tailwind CSS
posts.body: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first framework that lets you build modern designs without leaving your HTML.

posts.title: Intro to Composition API
posts.body: Vue 3's Composition API gives you more flexibility and better code organization.

posts.title: Working with Props and Emits
posts.body: Props allow passing data to child components, while emits help you send events back to the parent.
